text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore

Item specifications:
Grizzly 3/4-Inch bore shaper cutters feature top-quality c-2 carbide--the best available for wood cutting applications shaped and sharpened with dam
Double Lock Miter
Cutting length: 1-Inch
Can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics at 5,000 to 10,000 rpm

Product description:
text.Response A: This cutter is the one you've been looking for. With the top-quality c-2 carbide 3/4-inch bore shaper cutter, double lock miter, and 1-inch cutting length, it can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and even some plastics. It has a speed of 5,000 to 10,000 rpm.
text.Response B: Samsung uses the latest Lithium Ion battery technology giving you the best performance possible. This Lithium Ion battery is designed specifically for your Samsung Galaxy S3 mobile phone to deliver the most reliable and long lasting power (2100 mAh). The Galaxy S III 2100 mAh battery is also NFC-enabled, letting your phone communicate with other devices and accessories equipped with NFC technology.

915.displayed_text:
Prompt

Using the item specifications and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore

Item specifications:
Grizzly 3/4-Inch bore shaper cutters feature top-quality c-2 carbide--the best available for wood cutting applications shaped and sharpened with dam
Double Lock Miter
Cutting length: 1-Inch
Can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics at 5,000 to 10,000 rpm

Product description:

Response A

This cutter is the one you've been looking for. With the top-quality c-2 carbide 3/4-inch bore shaper cutter, double lock miter, and 1-inch cutting length, it can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and even some plastics. It has a speed of 5,000 to 10,000 rpm.

Response B

Samsung uses the latest Lithium Ion battery technology giving you the best performance possible. This Lithium Ion battery is designed specifically for your Samsung Galaxy S3 mobile phone to deliver the most reliable and long lasting power (2100 mAh). The Galaxy S III 2100 mAh battery is also NFC-enabled, letting your phone communicate with other devices and accessories equipped with NFC technology.
